name: Khodumodumo
description: The Khodumodumo is a gargantuan creature resembling an earthen hill when motionless, with impressive physical attributes and natural armor.
memorable: Its unique ability to blend into the environment and its devastating swallow attack make it both terrifying and memorable.
goals: Typically aims to ambush and consume unwary creatures, asserting dominance in its environment.
relations: May encounter other earth-dwelling creatures or be a terror among lesser monstrosities.
environment: Often found in hilly or mountainous terrains that enable its False Appearance ability.
strengths: Possesses high damage resistance to multiple types of damage and exceptional stealth capabilities.
weaknesses: Low intelligence, charisma, and wisdom scores limit its strategic and social capabilities.
attacks: Utilizes a Multiattack with its tongues and bite, capable of swallowing prey and inflicting ongoing damage.
most_powerful_ability: The swallow ability traps enemies, causing them to be blinded and take continuous acid damage.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 120 feet, allowing it to detect creatures without seeing them directly.
skills: Boasts exceptional stealth and perception skills, making it a challenging foe to detect.
additional_information: Immunity to poison and psychic damage for its Impaling Tongues.
Regenerates destroyed tongues after a long rest.
Bite attack can incapacitate and digest creatures.
Can grapple targets with long-reaching tongues, controlling the battlefield.
Effective ambusher using False Appearance to blend in.
test_queries: gargantuan creature that hides like a hill
powerful biting monster with long tongues
stealthy earth monster that swallows its prey
monstrous hill-like ambusher with acid attacks
